title: Clear All logging pattern
details:
The Clear All Quick Tabs functionality in sidebar/settings.js uses a correlation ID pattern for end-to-end tracing:
1. Generate correlationId with format `clear-${Date.now()}-${Math.random().toString(36).substring(2, 9)}`
2. Log BEFORE sendMessage with `[Settings] CLEAR_ALL_COMMAND_INITIATED | correlationId=... | timestamp=...`
3. Log in response handler with `[Settings] CLEAR_ALL_RESPONSE | correlationId=... | success=... | successCount=... | failCount=... | totalTabs=...`
4. Warn if failCount > 0
5. Error logging also includes correlationId for full traceability
